# War and Peace (2007 miniseries)

}}
War and Peace (, ) is a 2007 French-Italian drama miniseries directed by Robert Dornhelm. It was broadcast in Italy (Rai 1), Belgium (RTBF), in France (France 2) and in Russia (Telekanal Rossiya) in four parts during October and November 2007. It was inspired by Leo Tolstoy's 1869 novel War and Peace, which also is divided into four parts. The actors are of different nationalities.
